name: A Flamingo Tail
description:
When a hungry mongoose steals away the child of the River King, Flamingo is the only creature who takes a stiff-legged stand and goes on a journey to bring it back.

This was developed for the Tyranojam 2015 contest.

I may have forgotten to include a text file of why this follows the theme of United by Fate, but I think the story tells that well enough on its own.

Good luck everyone!
